title: Why do people complain so much about the public transportation here?
text:
Like I’ve lived in a few cities in the US and have travelled all over America and Europe. I don’t know that I can pick another city with better public transit. 

Obviously if you want to say NY or London it’s gonna be more expansive but that’s because there’s no other way to get around and it really only helps you if you live in the city. I could go  from Woodinville/Bothell/Everett/Tacoma to Seattle in one bus, I can get to UW to the airport on one train and be there in 30 minutes. 

In my hometown of Philly if you wanna go to the airport you’re getting on a dirty old slow SEPTA train that will get you there in 90 minutes. 

Is it just that people here haven’t lived other places and have nothing to compare it to?
